trans-unit.source: Represents a chart area on the chart image.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et diagramområde på diagrambildet.

trans-unit.source: Within any given chart, the *inner plot position* is the rectangular area, inside the x and y-axis lines, where the data points are drawn.
trans-unit.target: I en gitt diagram av *indre tegneplasseringen* er rektangulært område, i x og y-aksen linjer, der datapunkt tegnes.

trans-unit.source: The *plot position* is the rectangular area that encompasses the inner plot position, the tick marks, and the axis labels.
trans-unit.target: Den *tegnes posisjon* er rektangulært område som omfatter den indre tegneplasseringen aksemerkene og etikettene aksen.

trans-unit.source: The *chart area* is the rectangular area that encompasses the plot position, the tick marks, the axis labels and the axis titles on the chart.
trans-unit.target: Den *diagramområde* er rektangulært område som omfatter tegneplasseringen for aksemerkene, av akseetiketter og titlene aksen i diagrammet.

trans-unit.source: A chart area is represented by a ChartArea class; ChartArea objects are stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartAreaCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Et diagramområde representeres av et ChartArea-klassen. ChartArea-objekter som er lagret i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartAreaCollection>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartAreaCollection>

trans-unit.source: The number of chart series that can be plotted in a chart area is unlimited.
trans-unit.target: Antall diagramserien kan tegnes i et diagramområde er ubegrenset.

trans-unit.source: A ChartArea object: - Uses one distinct inner plotting area.
trans-unit.target: Et ChartArea-objekt:-bruker én distinkte innvendig plotting området.

trans-unit.source: - Is used to plot one or more chart series.
trans-unit.target: -Brukes til å tegne en eller flere serier i diagramområdet.

trans-unit.source: - Has primary and secondary x and y-axes, except for pie and doughnut chart types.
trans-unit.target: -Har primære og sekundære x og y-akser unntatt sektor-og hjuldiagrammer.

trans-unit.source: When you use Shape chart types, which includes pie, doughnut, funnel, pyramid, polar, and radar charts, the inner plotting position defines the size of the chart type shape.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker form diagramtyper, som inkluderer sektor hjuldiagrammer, trakten, pyramide Polært, og radardiagram diagrammer, definerer indre tegneområdet posisjonen størrelsen på diagrammet typen formen.

trans-unit.source: For example, when you increase the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.InnerPlotPosition%2A> property on a pie chart, you will increase the radius of the pie shape.
trans-unit.target: Når du for eksempel øker verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.InnerPlotPosition%2A>egenskapen på et sektordiagram økes radiusen for sektor-formen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.InnerPlotPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: For all other chart types, each chart area has two sets of X- and Y-axes, primary and secondary.
trans-unit.target: Alle andre diagramtyper har hver diagramområdet to sett med X og y-akser, primære og sekundære.

trans-unit.source: To access properties related to these axes, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisX%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisX2%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisY%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisY2%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilgang til egenskaper relatert til disse aksene, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisX%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisX2%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisY%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisY2%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisY2%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisX2%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisX%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you need to set a property that affects all axes on the chart, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Axes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du må angi en egenskap som påvirker alle akser på diagrammet ved å bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Axes%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Axes%2A>

trans-unit.source: One or more series are associated with a chart area.
trans-unit.target: Én eller flere serier knyttes til et diagramområde.

trans-unit.source: The series has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.ChartArea%2A> property that determines the chart area that each series belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Det har en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.ChartArea%2A>bestemmer for diagramområdet som tilhører hver serie.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.ChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the series is connected to the default chart area.
trans-unit.target: Serien er koblet til standard diagramområdet som standard.

trans-unit.source: To disable the display of a series, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.ChartArea%2A> property of that series to a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil deaktivere visning av en serie, angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.ChartArea%2A>for serien til en tom streng.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.ChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: If another chart area is added to the chart, you can associate any series with the new chart area.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et annet diagramområde legges til diagrammet, kan du knytte en serie med nye diagramområdet.

trans-unit.source: In all Shape chart types, as well as bar and stacked bar chart types, each series must be plotted in a separate chart area.
trans-unit.target: I alle form diagramtyper, samt for og stablet liggende stolpediagram typer, må hver serien tegnes i en separat diagramområde.

trans-unit.source: In all other chart types, multiple series can be combined in the same chart area.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kombinere flere serier i alle andre diagramtyper i det samme diagramområdet.

trans-unit.source: A 3D chart is displayed on a chart area-by-chart area basis.
trans-unit.target: Et 3D-diagram vises på diagrammet området diagramområdet basis.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Area3DStyle%2A> property to enable and customize your chart in 3D.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Area3DStyle%2A>til å aktivere og tilpasse diagrammet ditt i 3D.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Area3DStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The chart area minimum and maximum will not be automatically recalculated if you add new data, so the chart will not automatically change axis sizes.
trans-unit.target: Diagramområdet minimums- og beregnes ikke automatisk hvis du legger til nye data, så diagrammet ikke kan endre aksen størrelser automatisk.

trans-unit.source: You can require the chart area to recalculate these values by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.RecalculateAxesScale%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kreve diagramområdet til å beregne disse verdiene ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.RecalculateAxesScale%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.RecalculateAxesScale%2A>

trans-unit.source: To align multiple chart areas vertically, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentOrientation%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil justere flere diagramområder loddrett angitt av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentOrientation%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentOrientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: To align multiple chart areas horizontally, you must first position the chart areas using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Position%2A> property, and then set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentOrientation%2A> property to Horizontal.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil justere flere diagramområder vannrett, må du plassere diagramområder ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Position%2A>egenskap, og angi deretter det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentOrientation%2A>egenskapen vannrett.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentOrientation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: To suppress the display of a series, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> property of that series to a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil at en serie, angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>for serien til en tom streng.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å opprette og starte en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>klassen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is highly recommended that you use one of the `Add` or `Insert` methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ChartAreas%2A> collection property to add a chart area at run time.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Anbefales at du bruker en av de `Add` eller `Insert` metoder for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ChartAreas%2A>samlingen til å legge til et diagramområde ved kjøretid.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ChartAreas%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> class with the specified chart area name.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> klassen med det angitte navnet på diagramområdet som.

trans-unit.source: The name for the new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Navn for den nye <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment orientation of a chart area.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir justeringen for et diagramområde.

trans-unit.source: Through the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignWithChartArea%2A>, AlignmentOrientation and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A> properties, it is possible to align or synchronize two or more chart areas horizontally, vertically or both.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignWithChartArea%2A>, AlignmentOrientation og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A>Egenskaper, er det mulig å justere eller synkroniseres to eller flere diagramområder vannrett, loddrett eller begge deler.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignWithChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: First, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignWithChartArea%2A> property to the name of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object.
trans-unit.target: Angi først den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignWithChartArea%2A>egenskapen til navnet på en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignWithChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: This chart area will then be aligned, based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A> setting, which defines the alignment to use, and the AlignmentOrientation setting, which defines the elements of the chart area that should be used to set the alignment.
trans-unit.target: Dette diagramområdet deretter justeres, basert på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A>, som definerer justering hvis du vil bruke, og den AlignmentOrientation, som definerer elementer som skal brukes til å justere diagramområdet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignWithChartArea%2A> property is not set, the chart area will not be aligned, regardless of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A> and AlignmentOrientation settings.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignWithChartArea%2A>egenskapen er ikke angitt, diagramområdet, er ikke justert, uavhengig av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A>og AlignmentOrientation innstillinger.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignWithChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AreaAlignmentOrientations"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the alignment orientation of a chart area.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AreaAlignmentOrientations"> </xref> opplistingsverdi som angir retningen justering for et diagramområde.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment style of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir justeringen stilen for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the AlignmentStyle property to align two or more chart areas horizontally, vertically or both.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen AlignmentStyle skal justeres to eller flere diagramområder vannrett, loddrett eller begge deler.

trans-unit.source: The alignment type is one of the following values, or a bitwise OR combination of the values below.
trans-unit.target: Justering-typen er én av følgende verdier, eller en bitvis OR-kombinasjon av verdier nedenfor.

trans-unit.source: |Member Name|Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |All|Chart areas are aligned using all values.| |AxesView|Chart areas are aligned using the View of the specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>.| |Cursor|Chart areas are aligned on the cursor.| |None|Chart areas are not automatically aligned.| |Position|Chart areas are aligned with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Position%2A> of the chart area specified.| |InnerPlotPosition|Chart areas are aligned with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.InnerPlotPosition%2A> of the chart area specified.| If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignWithChartArea%2A> value is not set, the AlignmentStyle property will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: | Medlemsnavn | Beskrivelse | |-----------------|-----------------| | Alle | Diagramområder er justert ved hjelp av alle verdier. | | AxesView | Diagramområder er justert med visning av den angitte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>. | | Markøren | Diagramområder er justert på markøren. | | Ingen | Diagramområder justeres automatisk. | | Posisjonen | Diagramområder er justert med <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Position%2A>i diagramområdet som er angitt. | | InnerPlotPosition | Diagramområder er justert med <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.InnerPlotPosition%2A>i diagramområdet som er angitt. | Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignWithChartArea%2A>verdien er ikke angitt, AlignmentStyle-egenskapen har ingen virkning.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignWithChartArea%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.InnerPlotPosition%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Position%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AreaAlignmentStyles"></xref> enumeration value that can represent either a single value or the bitwise-OR of multiple values that define the alignment to use.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AreaAlignmentStyles"> </xref> opplistingsverdi som kan representere en enkeltverdi eller bitvis-eller med flere verdier som definerer justering hvis du vil bruke.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object to which this chart area should be aligned.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> objekt dette diagramområdet skal justeres.

trans-unit.source: Through the use of the AlignWithChartArea, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentOrientation%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A> properties, it is possible to align or synchronize two or more chart areas horizontally, vertically or both.
trans-unit.target: Ved å bruke AlignWithChartArea <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentOrientation%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A>Egenskaper, er det mulig å justere eller synkroniseres to eller flere diagramområder vannrett, loddrett eller begge deler.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentOrientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: First, set the AlignWithChartArea property to the name of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object.
trans-unit.target: Angi først AlignWithChartArea-egenskapen til navnet på en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>

trans-unit.source: This chart area will then be aligned, based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A> setting, which defines the alignment to use, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentOrientation%2A> setting, which defines the elements of the chart area that should be used to set the alignment.
trans-unit.target: Dette diagramområdet deretter justeres, basert på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A>innstilling, som definerer justering hvis du vil bruke, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentOrientation%2A>innstilling, som definerer elementer som skal brukes til å justere diagramområdet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentOrientation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the AlignWithChartArea property is not set, the chart area will not be aligned, regardless of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentOrientation%2A> settings.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen AlignWithChartArea ikke er angitt, blir ikke diagramområdet justerte, uavhengig av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentOrientation%2A>innstillinger.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentOrientation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AlignmentStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object to which this chart area should be aligned.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> verdi som representerer navnet på en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> objekt dette diagramområdet skal justeres.

trans-unit.source: The default is the empty string.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle"></xref> object, which is used to implement three-dimensional (3D) for all series in a chart area.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle"> </xref> -objektet som brukes til å implementere tredimensjonale (3D) for alle serier i et diagramområde.

trans-unit.source: To enable or disable 3D for a chart area, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.Enable3D%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil aktivere eller deaktivere 3D for et diagramområde, kan du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.Enable3D%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.Enable3D%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the chart is drawn in 3D, scale breaks are not supported on the axis.
trans-unit.target: Når diagrammet tegnes i 3D, støttes ikke Skalaskifter på aksen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle"></xref> object that implements 3D for all series plotted in a chart area.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle"> </xref> objekt som implementerer 3D for alle seriene tegnes inn i et diagramområde.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array that represents all axes for a chart area.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en matrise som representerer alle akser for et diagramområde.

trans-unit.source: The main purpose of this property is to provide access to the properties of the X, Y, X2 and Y2 axes at design time.
trans-unit.target: Det primære formålet for denne egenskapen er å gi tilgang til egenskaper for X, Y, X2 og Y2 akser under utformingen.

trans-unit.source: At run time, the axes for a chart area should be accessed using the individual axis properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisX%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisX2%2A>, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: Ved kjøretid, aksene for et diagramområde skal åpnes med egenskapene individuelle aksen som <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisX%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisX2%2A>og så videre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisX2%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisX%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you decide to use this property at run time—for example, in an event—you can access an item in this array by specifying an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisName> enumeration member as the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke denne egenskapen ved kjøretid, for eksempel på en hendelse — du har tilgang til et element i denne matrisen ved å angi en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisName>opplisting medlem som identifikatoren.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisName>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> objects that represents all axes used by a chart area.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> objekter som representerer alle akser som brukes av et diagramområde.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that represents the primary X-axis.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> objektet som representerer primære x-aksen.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to manipulate the primary X-axis in the chart area.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å endre primære x-aksen i diagramområdet.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that represents the primary X-axis.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> objektet som representerer primære x-aksen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that represents the secondary X-axis.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> objektet som representerer sekundær x-aksen.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to manipulate the secondary X-axis in the chart area.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å endre sekundær x-aksen i diagramområdet.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that represents the secondary X-axis.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> objektet som representerer sekundær x-aksen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that represents the primary Y-axis.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> objektet som representerer primære y-aksen.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to manipulate the primary Y-axis in the chart area.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å endre primære y-aksen i diagramområdet.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that represents the primary Y-axis.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> objektet som representerer primære y-aksen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that represents the secondary Y-axis.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> objektet som representerer sekundær y-aksen.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to manipulate the secondary Y-axis in the chart area.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å endre sekundær y-aksen i diagramområdet.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that represents the secondary Y-axis.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> objektet som representerer sekundær y-aksen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bakgrunnsfargen for en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi denne egenskapen til en gyldig verdi for ARGB (alfa red, grønn, blå).

trans-unit.source: The BackColor value will be the first color used if you have specified gradient colors for the background.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for bakgrunnsfarge blir første fargen som brukes hvis du har angitt gradering farger for bakgrunnen.

trans-unit.source: The alpha value controls the opacity of a color.
trans-unit.target: Alfaverdi kontrollerer tettheten for en farge.

trans-unit.source: If you set this color to "transparent"—that is, if you use an alpha value of 0—no color will be assigned to the background of the chart area.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du setter denne fargen til "gjennomsiktig" – det vil si hvis du bruker en alfaverdi 0 – ingen farge som skal tilordnes til bakgrunn for diagramområdet.

trans-unit.source: As a result, the background will be transparent.
trans-unit.target: Bakgrunnen vil resultatet være gjennomsiktig.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that specifies the background color of a chart area.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdi som angir bakgrunnsfargen for et diagramområde.

trans-unit.source: The default color is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color.White"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardfargen er <xref href="System.Drawing.Color.White"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the orientation for the background gradient of a chart area, and also determines whether or not a gradient is used.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir retningen for bakgrunnsgraderingen for et diagramområde, og angir også om gradering brukes.

trans-unit.source: Use the BackGradientStyle property to determine whether a chart area will display a gradient, and to determine the orientation of the gradient if one is used.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen BackGradientStyle til å fastslå om et diagramområde viser gradering, og for å finne ut retningen på graderingen Hvis én brukes.

trans-unit.source: For a listing of available patterns, refer to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: En liste over tilgjengelige mønstre, kan du se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle>opplisting.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle>

trans-unit.source: To use gradient colors: - Set the primary color of the chart area background with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruke gradering farger:-Angi primær farge for bakgrunn for diagramområde med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackColor%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Set the secondary color of the chart area background with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackSecondaryColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -Angi den sekundære fargen for bakgrunn for diagramområde med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackSecondaryColor%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackSecondaryColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Set this BackGradientStyle property to the desired gradient style.
trans-unit.target: -Angi denne BackGradientStyle-egenskapen til den ønskede gradering stilen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref> enumeration that specifies the orientation for the background gradient of a chart area and determines whether a gradient is used.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"> </xref> opplisting som angir retning for bakgrunnsgraderingen et diagramområde og bestemmer om gradering brukes.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hatching style of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir skravering stilen på en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle> enumeration specifies the hatch pattern used by a brush of type <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>Opplisting angir skravering mønsteret som brukes av en velgeren av typen <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>

trans-unit.source: The hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background.
trans-unit.target: Skravering mønsteret består av en fylt bakgrunnsfarge og linjer tegnes over bakgrunnen.

trans-unit.source: For a listing of available hatching styles, refer to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: En liste over tilgjengelige skravering maler, kan du se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>opplisting.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The color of hatching lines is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackSecondaryColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Fargen på skravering linjer fastsettes av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackSecondaryColor%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackSecondaryColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref> enumeration that specifies the hatching style of a chart area.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"> </xref> opplisting som angir skravering et diagramområde.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bakgrunnsbildet for en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: This property defines a path to a background image for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>, and can be an absolute or relative URL.
trans-unit.target: Definerer en bane til et bakgrunnsbilde for en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>, og kan være en absolutt eller relativ URL-adresse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>

trans-unit.source: To position the image, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackImageAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackImageWrapMode%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: For å plassere bildet, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackImageAlignment%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackImageWrapMode%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackImageWrapMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackImageAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also specify one of the colors displayed by the image as "transparent", by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackImageTransparentColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi ett av fargene som bildet som "gjennomsiktig", ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackImageTransparentColor%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackImageTransparentColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: An image be any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons.
trans-unit.target: Et bilde være en gyldig grafikkfil som støttes av .NET Framework, inkludert ikonene.

trans-unit.source: Background images take precedence over other background properties such as gradient color.
trans-unit.target: Bakgrunn overstyrer andre egenskaper for bakgrunn for eksempel graderingsfargen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the URL of an image file, used as the background image of a chart area.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> verdi som representerer URL-adressen til en bildefil, brukes som bakgrunnsbildet for et diagramområde.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> background image.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir justeringen for en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> bakgrunnsbildet.

trans-unit.source: This property determines the alignment of the background image for the chart area, and is only applied when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen bestemmer justering for bakgrunnsbilde for diagramområdet, og er bare brukt når <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>egenskapen settes til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the available alignments, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle> enumeration topic.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om tilgjengelige justeringer i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle>opplisting emnet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the alignment of the background image of the chart area.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle"> </xref> opplistingsverdi som angir justering for bakgrunnsbilde for diagramområdet.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object background image that will be drawn as transparent.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir fargen på en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> bakgrunnsbilde for objektet som skal tegnes som gjennomsiktig.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the color of a background image that will be drawn as transparent.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdi som angir fargen på et bakgrunnsbilde skal tegnes som gjennomsiktig.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the drawing mode for the background image of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tegnemodus for bakgrunnsbilde for en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The BackImageWrapMode property determines how the image is displayed; the image can be tiled, scaled, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen BackImageWrapMode bestemmer hvordan bildet vises. bildet kan være side ved side, skalert og så videre.

trans-unit.source: If an image is scaled, it will be stretched to fit within the bounds of the chart area.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et bilde skaleres, skal den strekkes for å passe i grensene for diagramområdet.

trans-unit.source: If the image is tiled, it is repeatedly drawn, starting from the top-left corner of the chart area.
trans-unit.target: Hvis bildet side ved side, tegnes den gjentatte ganger fra øvre venstre hjørnet i diagramområdet.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the available wrapping modes, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode> enumeration topic.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om de tilgjengelige wrapping modiene den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>opplisting emnet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>

trans-unit.source: If the BackImageWrapMode property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>, the location where the image is drawn is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackImageAlignment%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen BackImageWrapMode er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>, bestemmes plasseringen der tegnes bildet av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackImageAlignment%2A>egenskapsinnstillingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackImageAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the drawing mode for the background image of a chart area.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"> </xref> opplistingsverdi som angir tegnemodus for bakgrunnsbilde for et diagramområde.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the secondary color for the background of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den sekundære fargen for bakgrunn for en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: This BackSecondaryColor property is one of several related properties that determine the secondary background color of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> objects, and is used when gradient colors are being applied.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen BackSecondaryColor er én av flere egenskaper som angir den sekundære bakgrunnsfargen for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objekter, og brukes når gradering farger brukes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: You can set BackSecondaryColor to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: Du kan konfigurere BackSecondaryColor til en gyldig verdi for ARGB (alfa red, grønn, blå).

trans-unit.source: If hatching is used, the BackSecondaryColor property determines the color of the hatching lines for the chart area.
trans-unit.target: Hvis skravering brukes, angir egenskapen BackSecondaryColor fargen på linjene skravering for diagramområdet.

trans-unit.source: To use gradient colors for the background of a chart area: - Set the primary color with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruke gradering farger for bakgrunn for et diagramområde:-Angi primær farge med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackColor%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Set the secondary color with the BackSecondaryColor property.
trans-unit.target: -Angi den sekundære fargen med egenskapen BackSecondaryColor.

trans-unit.source: - Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackGradientStyle%2A> property to the desired gradient style.
trans-unit.target: -Angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackGradientStyle%2A>egenskapen ønsket gradering stilen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackGradientStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that specifies the secondary color for the background of a chart area.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdi som angir den sekundære fargen for bakgrunn for et diagramområde.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border color of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kantlinjefargen for en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: You can set the BorderColor property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi kantlinjefarge-egenskapen til en gyldig verdi for ARGB (alfa red, grønn, blå).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For pie and doughnut charts, this property determines the color of radial and horizontal lines if data labels are drawn outside the pie or doughnut—that is, if the `LabelStyle` custom property is set to "Outside".
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For sektor-og hjuldiagrammer denne egenskapen bestemmer fargen på radielle og vannrette linjer hvis dataetiketter tegnes utenfor sektor- eller hjuldiagram – det vil si hvis den `LabelStyle` egendefinert egenskap er satt til "Utsiden".

trans-unit.source: This property also determines the marker lines for 3D charts if the `ShowMarkerLines` custom property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer denne egenskapen også merkelinjene for 3D-diagrammer hvis den `ShowMarkerLines` egendefinert egenskap er satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that specifies the border color of a chart area.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdi som angir kantlinjefargen for et diagramområde.

trans-unit.source: The default color is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardfargen er <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller Angir kantlinjestilen for en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The BorderDashStyle property determines the line style to use for a border.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen BorderDashStyle angir linjestilen skal brukes for en kantlinje.

trans-unit.source: The line can be solid, dotted, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: Linjen kan være fylt prikket og så videre.

trans-unit.source: For other border styles, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle> enumeration topic.
trans-unit.target: For andre Kantlinjestilene, kan du se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle>opplisting emnet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"></xref> enumeration value that determines the border style of the chart area.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"> </xref> opplistingsverdi som angir kantlinjestilen for diagramområdet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border width of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kantlinjetykkelsen for en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Note that the BorderWidth property can also set the width of lines for line charts, custom legend items displayed with a line style, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at egenskapen BorderWidth kan også angi tykkelsen på linjene for linjediagram, egendefinerte elementer for forklaring vises med en linjestil og så videre.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that determines the border width, in pixels, of the chart area.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> verdi som bestemmer kantlinjetykkelsen på diagramområdet i piksler.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor"></xref> object that is used for cursors and selected ranges along the X-axis.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor"> </xref> objektet som brukes for markører og valgt områder langs x-aksen.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor> object is used for the X-axis cursor and its selected ranges.
trans-unit.target: Dette <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor>objektet brukes til x-aksen markøren, og de valgte områdene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor>

trans-unit.source: For all charts except bar chart types, the X-axis cursor represents the vertical cursor.
trans-unit.target: For alle diagrammer unntatt stolpediagram typer representerer x-aksen markøren loddrette markøren.

trans-unit.source: For bar chart types, the X-axis cursor represents the horizontal cursor.
trans-unit.target: For stolpediagram typer representerer x-aksen markøren vannrette markøren.

trans-unit.source: Refer to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor> class documentation for a description of its members, as well as sample source code.
trans-unit.target: Se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor>klasse dokumentasjonen for en beskrivelse av medlemmene, i tillegg til eksempelkode for datakilden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor"></xref> object used for cursors and selected ranges along the X-axis.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor"> </xref> objektet som ble brukt for markører og valgte områdene langs x-aksen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor"></xref> object that is used for cursors and selected ranges along the Y-axis.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor"> </xref> objektet som brukes for markører og valgt områder langs y-aksen.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor> object is used for the Y-axis cursor and its selected ranges.
trans-unit.target: Dette <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor>objektet brukes til y-aksen markøren, og de valgte områdene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor>

trans-unit.source: For all charts except bar chart types, the Y-axis cursor represents the horizontal cursor.
trans-unit.target: For alle diagrammer unntatt stolpediagram typer representerer y-aksen markøren vannrette markøren.

trans-unit.source: For bar chart types, the Y-axis cursor represents the vertical cursor.
trans-unit.target: For stolpediagram typer representerer y-aksen markøren loddrette markøren.

trans-unit.source: Refer to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor> class documentation for a description of its members, as well as sample source code.
trans-unit.target: Se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor>klasse dokumentasjonen for en beskrivelse av medlemmene, i tillegg til eksempelkode for datakilden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor"></xref> object used for cursors and selected ranges along the Y-axis.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Cursor"> </xref> objektet som ble brukt for markører og valgte områdene langs y-aksen.

trans-unit.source: Releases unmanaged and, optionally, managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Versjoner uforvaltet, og eventuelt administreres ressurser.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both unmanaged and managed resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både uforvaltede og behandlede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Returns the depth of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> in a chart area.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer dybden på en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"> </xref> i et diagramområde.

trans-unit.source: Call this method to get the depth of a specified series.
trans-unit.target: Kalle denne metoden hvis du vil ha dybden på en angitt serie.

trans-unit.source: The returned value is measured as a percentage of the chart area's depth, which is the same unit of measurement used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Point3D.Z%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den returnerte verdien måles som en prosentdel av for diagramområdet dybde, som er den samme målenheten brukes i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Point3D.Z%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Point3D.Z%2A>

trans-unit.source: All series have a depth, regardless of their chart type.
trans-unit.target: Alle serier har dybden, uansett diagramtype.

trans-unit.source: For example, even point and bubble series have a depth, even though the entire depth is not used to draw the points or bubbles.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel velger selv og boble serien har dybden, selv om hele dybden ikke brukes til å tegne punkt eller bobler.

trans-unit.source: The depth of a series can be used to determine a Z value for a point that is used in a custom drawing routine.
trans-unit.target: Dybden på en serie kan brukes til å fastsette en Z-verdi for et punkt som er brukt i en egendefinert tegning rutine.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Any points used in custom 3D drawing must be transformed from relative 3D coordinates to relative 2D coordinates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.TransformPoints%2A>method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Points brukes i egendefinerte 3D tegning må transformeres fra relative 3D-koordinater til relative 2D koordinater som bruker den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.TransformPoints%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.TransformPoints%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get relative X and Y-values from an axis, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.ValueToPosition%2A> method for both the X and Y axes.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil hente relativ X og Y-verdier fra en akse, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.ValueToPosition%2A>metode for X og Y-akser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.ValueToPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> for which the depth is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"> </xref> for dybden hentes.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_float" name="float" href=""></xref> value that represents the depth of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref>, which is measured as a percentage of the chart area's depth.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_float" name="float" href=""> </xref> verdi som Representer dybden på den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"> </xref>, som måles som en prosentdel av dybden for diagramområdet.

trans-unit.source: Returns the Z position of a series, which is useful for custom drawing.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer Z-posisjonen i en serie som er nyttig for egendefinert tegning.

trans-unit.source: Call this method to get the Z position of a series.
trans-unit.target: Kalle denne metoden for å få Z-plasseringen i en serie.

trans-unit.source: The Z position is measured from the back wall of the chart area to the center of a data series, and is represented as a percentage of the chart area's depth.
trans-unit.target: Z-posisjonen måles fra den tilbake på diagramområdeveggen i diagramområdet til midtpunktet for en serie, og er representert som en prosentdel av dybden for diagramområdet.

trans-unit.source: For example, a series that is drawn halfway along the Z-axis has a Z position of 50.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel har en serie som tegnes andre siden langs z-aksen en Z-posisjonen på 50.

trans-unit.source: The Z position of a series is normally used for a custom drawing routine.
trans-unit.target: Z-posisjonen i en serie brukes vanligvis for en egendefinert tegning rutine.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Any points used in custom 3D drawing must be transformed from relative 3D coordinates to relative 2D coordinates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.TransformPoints%2A>method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Points brukes i egendefinerte 3D tegning må transformeres fra relative 3D-koordinater til relative 2D koordinater som bruker den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.TransformPoints%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.TransformPoints%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get relative X and Y-values from an axis, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.ValueToPosition%2A> method for both the X and Y axes.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil hente relativ X og Y-verdier fra en akse, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.ValueToPosition%2A>metode for X og Y-akser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.ValueToPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> for which the Z position is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"> </xref> for Z-posisjonen hentes.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_float" name="float" href=""></xref> value that represents the Z position of the specified series, which is measured as a percentage of the depth of a chart area.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_float" name="float" href=""> </xref> verdi som Representer Z-posisjonen for den angitte serien målt i prosent av dybden på et diagramområde.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition"></xref> object, which defines the inner plot position of a chart area object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition"> </xref> -objekt som definerer den indre tegneplasseringen for et diagramobjekt for området.

trans-unit.source: The InnerPlotPosition property defines the rectangle within a chart area element that is used for plotting data; it excludes tick marks, axis labels, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen InnerPlotPosition definerer rektangel i et diagramelement for området som skal brukes for tegneområdet data. den utelukker aksemerkene, akseetiketter og så videre.

trans-unit.source: The coordinates used for this property (0,0 to 100,100) are related to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object, and not to the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>.
trans-unit.target: Koordinatene brukes for denne egenskapen (0,0 til 100,100) som er relatert til det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>objektet, og ikke hele <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>

trans-unit.source: The InnerPlotPosition property can be used to align multiple chart areas.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen InnerPlotPosition kan brukes til å justere flere diagramområder.

trans-unit.source: However, if one chart area has tick marks and axis labels and another one does not, their axis lines cannot be aligned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis én diagramområdet har aksemerker og etiketter og en annen dette ikke finnes, kan imidlertid ikke aksen linjene justeres.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > This property can also be used to change the size of charts, such as pie or doughnut, without changing the size of the generated chart image.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Denne egenskapen kan også brukes til å endre størrelsen på diagrammer, for eksempel sektor- eller hjuldiagram, uten å endre størrelsen på genererte diagrambildet.

trans-unit.source: To change the position of an entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Position%2A> property instead.
trans-unit.target: Endre plasseringen av en hel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>objekt bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Position%2A>egenskapen i stedet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Position%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition"></xref> object, which defines the inner plot position of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition"> </xref> -objekt som definerer den indre tegneplasseringen for en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that determines if the labels of the relevant chart area axes are of equal size.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et flagg som bestemmer om etikettene for de aktuelle diagramområdeakser med samme størrelse.

trans-unit.source: The font size is automatically calculated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control, with the largest size that fits being used.
trans-unit.target: Skriftstørrelsen beregnes automatisk av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>kontroll med den største størrelsen som passer brukes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: This property applies to all chart area axes that have their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IsLabelAutoFit%2A> property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder for alle diagramområdeakser som har de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IsLabelAutoFit%2A>-egenskapen satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IsLabelAutoFit%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all axes that have their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IsLabelAutoFit*> property set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and will display their labels using the same font size; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false." name="false." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis alle akser som har de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IsLabelAutoFit*>-egenskapen satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> og vises etikettene med samme skrift størrelsen; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false." name="false." href=""> </xref> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.IsLabelAutoFit*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unique name of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir det unike navnet på en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The name of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object must be unique, otherwise an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>objektet må være unike, ellers vil det bli utløst et unntak.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>

trans-unit.source: This property can be used as the indexer when retrieving a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartAreaCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan brukes som indeksering under henting av en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>objektet fra den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartAreaCollection>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartAreaCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du setter denne egenskapen til en tom streng.

trans-unit.source: an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: bli vil utløst et unntak.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the unique name of a <xref uid="langword_csharp_ChartArea" name="ChartArea" href=""></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> verdi som representerer det unike navnet på en <xref uid="langword_csharp_ChartArea" name="ChartArea" href=""> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition"></xref> object that defines the position of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition"> </xref> -objekt som definerer plasseringen av en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> objekt i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property defines the position of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>, and includes tick marks, axis labels, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: Definerer plasseringen av en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>objekt i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>, og inkluderer aksemerkene, akseetiketter og så videre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>

trans-unit.source: The coordinates used for this property (0,0 to 100,100) are related to the entire chart image.
trans-unit.target: Koordinatene brukes for denne egenskapen (0,0 til 100,100) er knyttet til hele diagrambildet.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition"></xref> object that defines the position of a chart area object within the chart image.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition"> </xref> -objekt som definerer plasseringen av et diagramobjekt for diagramområdet i diagrambildet.

trans-unit.source: Recalculates the properties of the chart area after changes have been made to the chart in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Customize"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Beregner på nytt egenskaper for diagramområdet etter har blitt gjort endringer i diagrammet i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Customize"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: If you use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Customize> event to make changes, it is sometimes necessary to recalculate chart area properties so that the chart is rendered correctly.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Customize>-hendelsen for å gjøre endringer, er noen ganger må du oppdatere egenskaper for diagram-området slik at diagrammet gjengis på riktig måte.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Customize>

trans-unit.source: For example, if an axis range is changed, the labels for that axis must be recalculated.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis et område for akse endres, må etikettene for denne aksen beregnes på nytt.

trans-unit.source: Call this method after you use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Customize> event to make ANY changes to a chart area.
trans-unit.target: Kalle denne metoden når du har brukt den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Customize>hendelsen, slik at eventuelle endringer i et diagramområde.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Customize>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shadow color of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir Skyggefarge for en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan settes til en gyldig verdi for ARGB (alfa red, grønn, blå).

trans-unit.source: The alpha value can be used to achieve a "realistic" shadowing effect; try a color value of "128,0,0,0" for shadows.
trans-unit.target: Alfaverdi kan brukes for en "realistisk" shadowing effekt. Prøv fargeverdien "128,0,0,0" for skygger.

trans-unit.source: To implement a shadow, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.ShadowOffset%2A> property to a value other than zero (0).
trans-unit.target: For å implementere skygge, angitt av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.ShadowOffset%2A>til en annen verdi enn null (0).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.ShadowOffset%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that specifies the shadow color of a chart area.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdi som angir skyggefargen for et diagramområde.

trans-unit.source: The default color is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>.
trans-unit.target: Standardfargen er <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shadow offset, in pixels, of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir skyggeforskyvning i piksler for en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: To implement shadowing, use a value other than zero (0).
trans-unit.target: For å implementere skygging, kan du bruke en annen verdi enn null (0).

trans-unit.source: A positive value will result in a shadow that shifts down and to the right.
trans-unit.target: En positiv verdi vil føre til en skygge flytter nedover og til høyre.

trans-unit.source: A negative value will result in a shadow that shifts up and to the left.
trans-unit.target: En negativ verdi vil føre til en skygge flytter opp og til venstre.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> that represents the shadow offset, in pixels, of the chart area.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> som representerer skyggeforskyvning på diagramområdet i piksler.

trans-unit.source: Applies 3D transformations to an array of 3D points, which must be done before GDI+ drawing methods can be called.
trans-unit.target: Gjelder 3D transformasjoner en punktmatrisen 3D, og det må gjøres før GDI + tegning metoder kan kalles.

trans-unit.source: An array of 3D points.
trans-unit.target: En punktmatrisen 3D.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that determines if a chart area is visible.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et flagg som bestemmer om et diagramområde er synlig.

trans-unit.source: When this flag is set to `false`, all series, legends, titles and annotation objects associated with the chart area will also be hidden.
trans-unit.target: Når dette flagget er satt til `false`, blir også skjult alle serier, forklaringer, titlene og merknad objekter som er knyttet til diagramområdet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the chart area is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis diagramområdet er synlige. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
